compounddef.innerclass: vigra::IteratorTraits< BasicImageIterator< FFTWComplex< R >, FFTWComplex< R > ** > >
vigra::IteratorTraits< ConstBasicImageIterator< FFTWComplex< R >, FFTWComplex< R > ** > >

memberdef.name: VIGRA_DEFINE_FFTW_COMPLEX_FUNCTION
memberdef.initializer: template <class R> \ inline FFTWComplex<R> fct(const FFTWComplex<R> &a) \ { \ return std::fct(reinterpret_cast<std::complex<R> const &>(a)); \ }
